member.name: M:ImageResizer.Plugins.WhitespaceTrimmer.BoundingBoxFinder.FindBoxSobel(System.Drawing.Bitmap,System.Drawing.Rectangle,System.Byte)
member.summary: Returns a rectangle inside 'lookInside' that bounds any energy greater than 'threshold'.
member.param: A rectangle of 'image' to look inside.
1-255, the energy threshold to detect activity. 80-150 is a good range.

member.name: M:ImageResizer.Plugins.WhitespaceTrimmer.BoundingBoxFinder.FindBoxExact(AForge.Imaging.UnmanagedImage,System.Drawing.Color)
member.summary: Returns a bounding box that only excludes the specified color.
